short_intro.text: Gold For Cash Inc. is here to provide you with creative work worth your money. Gold is the standard, cut-through our currency. Let us crush mediocrity and break some hearts along the way, shall we?  G4C comes as a one-man lineup with creative director Oliver De Vitre—formerly known as Oliver Frank—or as a collective of fellow like-minded creatives. With agencies like Wieden+Kennedy, R/GA and VCCP under our belt, we know the game inside out and we aren’t in it to play it safe.

address.text:
717 Brooks Ave

about.html: Europe’s biggest fashion retailer Zalando wanted to make absolutely clear that style was never meant to please everyone, and that we all know very well that we will be judged.  An integrated campaign that ran in 28 countries inspired their fashion-savvy audience to #StandByYourStyle and love what they wear - no matter the haters.

about.html: Nike Berlin's "Battle of the Districts" turned urban rivalry into a sports competition. Kicking off with a street football frenzy in Berlin, it sparked football excitement amongst teens, with London and Paris quick to join the action. The campaign was a challenge thrown down to every corner of Berlin, stirring up the spirit of competition with in-your-face wildpostings and gritty urban installations. Over four months, 5,000+ players clashed on the “cages”, the fenced in street courts typical for Berlin, fighting for their turf. The prize? Bragging rights for Kreuzberg, the reigning champs. Local pride, Nike style.

img1_caption.html: Because advertising around schools is banned in Germany, we produced real metal warning signs on public football courts featured the only rules that apply to street football to make the collectibles. Headline reads: “Foul at own risk”.

statement_2.html: We love to do work that resonates with culture rather than award juries and we win awards anyway.

about.html: A campaign for Birkenstock's first shoe that isn't a sandal, but a sneaker (gasp). The European-wide launch was developed direct to client and produced on a shoestring budget, excuse the pun. The world was in shock and awe over the Birkenstock "Bend", the sneaker sold out within two weeks.

about.html:
A double-headed campaign for Nike Air showing both sides of Nike's famous shock absorbing shoe technology.

‘Endure’ dramatizes how hard sports can go on both your body and soul, and was awarded with a Bronze Lion for Film at Cannes.

‘Defy’ celebrates how athletes feel suspended from gravity with Nike Air cushioning. It won a Clio and best film at the Art Director’s Club Germany.
